about_the_game:
Sling-A-Thing is a mind-boggling, laugh-out-loud, comedy action puzzler that will keep you entertained for hours. Dive into a whimsical world where you transform into an incredible variety of cartoon characters and objects, all to find your way to the exit in the most creative ways possible.

Features:
Quirky, Surprising & Satisfying Gameplay

Every level is designed to surprise you with quirky challenges and satisfying solutions. The humor and creativity packed into each puzzle make every moment enjoyable.
Over 100 Levels to Conquer

With more than 100 unique levels, there’s always a new challenge waiting for you. Each level presents different obstacles and puzzles that will test your wit and reflexes.
Transform into Over 20 Different Things

One of the most exciting features of Sling-A-Thing is the ability to transform into more than 20 different characters and objects. From quirky creatures to everyday items, each transformation offers unique abilities that help you navigate through the puzzles.
Original Transformation Mechanic

The transformation mechanic is truly original, allowing you to think outside the box. You’ll need to strategize which transformation to use and when, making the gameplay both challenging and incredibly fun.
Prepare for a delightful adventure with Sling-A-Thing! It’s the perfect blend of comedy and puzzle-solving action, ensuring an experience you won’t forget. Transform, strategize, and laugh your way to victory!
